meanings.sent1: She retargets the camera to capture the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: He retargets the basketball towards the hoop for a perfect shot.
meanings.sent3: The detective retargets his suspect after new evidence emerges.
meanings.sent4: Her determination retargets her focus on achieving her goals.
meanings.sent5: The teacher retargets the student's attention to the important lesson.

meanings.definition: To focus on a new target
meanings.sent1: The archer retargets his arrow towards the bullseye.
meanings.sent2: After finishing one project, she retargets her efforts on the next task.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully retargets its chase from a toy to a moving shadow.
meanings.sent4: His ambition retargets towards a new career opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The company retargets its marketing strategies to attract younger customers.

meanings.definition: Redirects advertising to a different audience
meanings.sent1: The company retargets its ads to reach a wider demographic.
meanings.sent2: She retargets the campaign towards online shoppers for better engagement.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously retargets his jokes to appeal to a new audience.
meanings.sent4: The brand retargets its message to resonate with a diverse customer base.
meanings.sent5: The organization retargets its promotional efforts to attract more supporters.
